app.name: justoneapi Data API Client
app.one_liner: A client application for accessing standardized data APIs from Chinese e-commerce and social platforms like Xiaohongshu, Taobao, Douyin, and Kuaishou.

screens.name: API Selection Dashboard
screens.purpose: Allow users to browse and select available data APIs by platform and category.
primary_actions: Choose data type (e.g., Note Details, Product Reviews)

rust_commands.name: fetch_douyin_video
rust_commands.purpose: Get metadata and engagement stats for a Douyin video.

rust_commands.name: fetch_kuaishou_user_videos
rust_commands.purpose: List all videos published by a Kuaishou user.

rust_commands.name: fetch_taobao_product
rust_commands.purpose: Fetch comprehensive product details from Taobao including sales and reviews.

rust_commands.name: fetch_xiaohongshu_note
rust_commands.purpose: Retrieve detailed data for a specific Xiaohongshu note using its ID.

mvp_plan: week 1: Add support for Xiaohongshu Note Details endpoint
week 1: Build main dashboard screen UI
week 1: Define data models for Xiaohongshu notes
week 1: Implement core API client infrastructure
week 2: Extend data model with Taobao product schema
week 2: Integrate Taobao Product Details API
acceptance_tests: Kuaishou User Video List loads correctly when given a valid user ID.
The application displays structured data from Douyin Video Details without errors.
User can select Xiaohongshu Note Details from the main dashboard and successfully retrieve a note by ID.
User can switch to Taobao Product Details and fetch a valid product with 30-day sales data.
